description: Unique identifier for this purchase order status history entry.
Identifier of the purchase order whose status change this entry records.
Flag indicating this entry represents an authorization/approval stage rather than a processing state; confirm with SME.
Date and time the purchase order transitioned to this status.
System code for the purchase orderâ€™s status at the recorded time.
Human-readable description of the status displayed to users.
Likely reference to a related labor/demonstration record tied to the order; confirm with SME.
IP address captured when this record was written/updated, for audit tracking.
Identifier of the user who created or last updated this record.
Initials of the user who performed the change, for audit purposes.
Timestamp when this status history record was created or last modified.
Indicates whether all required approvals for the order/status have been completed.
